titleStmt.title: Good Christian looke to thy creede : for a true triall of an holy profession, and of the truth of religion, from all crooked by-paths. / By Richard Bernard rector of Batcombe in Sumersetshire..
titleStmt.author: Bernard, Richard, 1568-1641.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted by Felix Kyngston, and are to be sold by Edward Blackmore, at the Angell in Pauls Church-yard.,
